actions.committee: Senate Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Traffic Act, 1925, to provide for the removal, impoundment, or immobilization of motor vehicles.

summary.text: Provides for the removal, impoundment, or immobilization of motor vehicles in the District of Columbia against which there are two or more outstanding unsettled traffic violation notices under the District of Columbia Traffic Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Traffic Act, 1925, to provide for the removal, impoundment, or immobilization of motor vehicles.
